name: Talis Capital
locations_freeform: London; Unit 4 Rowan Court, 56 High Street, Wimbledon, London, United Kingdom, SW19 5EE
description: Talis Capital is a venture capital firm that invests with high conviction at Seed & Series A stages across Europe and the US, helping founders who envision the future differently to build it.

investment_stages.1: Talis invests with high conviction at Seed & Series A across Europe and US

investment_verticals.2: Health IT, IoT, Cloud Infrastructure, Impact, FinTech, DeepTech, Gaming/eSports, Social Commerce, Real Estate/PropTech, AI, Fashion, Health & Hospital Services, Material Science, Consumer Internet, Chemicals, Insurance, Social Networks, Data Services, Cybersecurity, ClimateTech/CleanTech, SaaS, Food and Beverage, Enterprise, EnergyTech, Enterprise Infrastructure, Consumer Health, Wellness & Fitness, AgTech, BioTech, Direct-to-Consumer (DTC), Future of Work
investment_verticals.1: Talis invests in various sectors including Darktrace, Onfido, Portalone, Ynsect, Carta, and Howl
